message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor.  It's a fair start, considering the inflation we'll both face later.
Let's split it 55/45 in my favor. It's a more balanced start and gives us both a good chunk of the money before inflation kicks in too much.
I'm willing to compromise and offer a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's still a decent deal, and we can avoid further inflation losses if we agree now.
